Featured Artist

Grandier Bella

Bellaâ€™s works is recognized for his deft handling of color with careful brush rendering. Often combining strong hues with complementing color schemes, he has successfully attained a level of realism in depicting his subjects. Works by Bella have been exhibited in several galleries in the Philippines, Denmark, Dubai, and the USA. He is currently affiliated with the Filipino Portrait Artists Guild, and a lecturer at the University of the Philippines College of Fine Arts.
